title: Claire Coutinho – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Claire Coutinho, the Conservative MP for East Surrey, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
It’s been a difficult time for the country and the party. The global economy is facing new challenges and opportunities. We need someone who can steer us through. Rishi Sunak is one of the best people I’ve worked with and I think he’s the right person for the job.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
